page.title: 10 Recreation in Downpatrick
page.content:
{Voluntary/Charitable:}Lions',Round Table,Gateway,Peter Pan,Knights of Malta,Save the Children,St.V de Paul, A.A.,Fund.
{Sports/Recreation:}Youth Club,R.G.U., Golf,Cricket,Bridge,Bowling,Chess, Soccer,Guides,Racing,Track,Scouts,De La Salle Sports,Martial Arts,Swimming.
{Special Interests:}Camera,Art,Drama, Down Field, Folk,Irish Dancing,Bird Watchers, Young Farmers',Choral Society, Lecale Historical, Lecale Gaelic Societies.
{Miscellaneous:}Working mens',Chamber of Trade,Twinning Society,Womens' Institute,B and P women,Down Club.
Aidan Conlon,age 13yr.
